meanings.definition: Relating to the scientific study of the oceans.
meanings.sent1: The oceanographical research vessel set sail to explore the depths of the sea.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use oceanographical data to understand marine life better.
meanings.sent3: The oceanographical team discovered a new species of fish that wore tiny glasses.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for oceanographical research was as deep as the ocean itself.
meanings.sent5: The oceanographical expedition uncovered mysteries hidden beneath the waves.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the physical and biological aspects of the oceans.
meanings.sent1: The oceanographical features of the coral reef fascinated the marine biologists.
meanings.sent2: Oceanographical studies help protect marine ecosystems from harm.
meanings.sent3: The oceanographical conference had a surprise guest appearance by a talking dolphin.
meanings.sent4: The oceanographical diversity of marine life is a wonder to behold.
meanings.sent5: The oceanographical beauty of the underwater world captivated the young explorer.
